isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TURBOCHARGER ASSEMBLY (ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED); REPLACE

wtsproc.config: For Engine Serial No 2000001 & higher (2004 I6 Engines)

step1.para: Install wheel chocks, open hood and remove engine splash shield
Remove air cleaner housing, include disconnect hose and IAT sensor
Remove air cleaner mount bracket nuts and reposition bracket for access to heat shield fasteners
Remove turbocharger heat shield from bracket and then remove air cleaner bracket
Remove charge air cooler outlet hose
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbocharger
Disconnect oil supply hose from turbocharger
Disconnect turbocharger oil drain hose from block, using drain pan to catch oil.
Disconnect wiring at turbocharger control module
Remove turbocharger assembly from exhaust manifold. Cap open ports.
Transfer turbocharger control module (SRA) to new turbocharger if required
Clean mounting surfaces and parts
Install turbocharger assembly with drain tube attached. Connect tube to crankcase and wiring to control module
Connect turbocharger oil supply hose
Connect exhaust outlet pipe to turbocharger
Place air cleaner mounting bracket into position (do not bolt down)
Install turbocharger heat shield to mount bracket
Install air cleaner mounting bracket
Install air cleaner housing, include connect hose and IAT sensor
Install charge air cooler intake hose
Install engine splash shield, close hood assembly and remove wheel chocks
